ad_source_material.body_copy: You've described your symptoms. You've been told you're too young, or it's stress, or just get some blood work done. Sulu gives you something different: a clear, dated record of exactly what you've been experiencing — ready to hand to any doctor in 30 seconds. Fourteen days of tracking. One PDF. ad_source_material.headline: 14 days. One PDF. Harder to dismiss.
